title: Kristen Stewart blasts Donald Trump AGAIN as she hosts SNL: "He tweeted about me 11 times!"
text:

Hollywood actors love to blur the line between performer and politician - which is exactly Kristen Stewart did when she hosted Saturday Night Live, yesterday. 
The critically-acclaimed star, 26, used the opportunity to throw shade at the US President for tweets dating back to 2012. 
“I’m a little nervous to be hosting because I know that the president’s probably watching and, um, I don’t think he likes me that much. Here’s how I know,” she said as she opened the show. 
“Four years ago I was dating this guy Rob—Robert—and we broke up and then we got back together, and for some reason it made Donald Trump go insane,” she added. “Here’s what he actually tweeted, and this is real" 
She then read out message, dated 17 October 2012, which referenced her break-up with Robert Pattison. Kristen Stewart on Saturday Night Live, this weekend (Photo: NBC) The now-US President had several things to say about her split from Robert Pattison (Photo: REUTERS) Read More Donald Trump slams 'so-called' judge who blocked Muslim ban as he appeals saying 'we'll win' 
It said: 'Robert Pattinson should not take back Kristen Stewart. She cheated on him like a dog & will do it again--just watch. He can do much better!'. 
Responding to the message, she told viewers: “Now I know what you’re thinking, right? That’s so crazy! The president tweeted about you once! No, no, no. The president tweeted about me eleven times ." 
However, she then tried to imply that he's gay. 
“OK. So to be fair, I don’t think Donald Trump hated me,” Stewart continued. “I think he’s in love with my boyfriend, because he also tweeted this [an invite forPattison t join him at Miss Universe]”. Kristen is known for her dislike of the businessman-turned-politician (Photo: NBC) The Twilight actress implied that the POTUS is both gay and homophobic (Photo: NBC) President Donald Trump continues to be divisive in Hollywood (Photo: Getty) Read More 'Dear Donald Trump, I don't think you're being fair': Girl, 7, pens brilliant letter to president over 'Muslim ban' 
“So yeah, that’s crazy, right? The president is not a huge fan of me,” she joke. 
“But that is so OK, and Donald, if you didn’t like me then, you’re really probably not going to like me now, because I’m hosting SNL and I’m like, so gay dude .” 
She was referencing her alleged romance with Victoria's Secret beauty Stella Maxwell, according to US reports. 
The Cafe Society actress - who was most recently romantically linked with singer St. Vincent - is reportedly "having fun" with the beauty, and the pair recently enjoyed spending time together in Savannah, Georgia, where the 26-year-old star has been shooting a new movie, according to People.
